translations.translation: Amid searing blasts and scalding water
Will be in the scorching wind and boiling water,
They will be in the midst of scorching wind and boiling water,
They will live amid the scorching,
In scorching wind and boiling hot water.
In Samum, and Hamim.
In hot wind and boiling water,
mid burning winds and boiling waters
In scorching wind and scalding water
They will find themselves in scorching wind and scalding water,
Amidst scorching wind and scalding water.
Amid infernal miasma and boiling water
(They will be) in the midst of a Fierce Blast of Fire and in Boiling Water,
In fierce hot wind and boiling water,
(they shall live) amid burning winds and boiling water,
Amid searing wind and boiling water.
[They will be] in scorching fire and scalding water
[56:42] Amid a scorching wind, an infernal wind, permeating the pores of skins, and scalding water, water of extreme temperatures,

(In scorching wind) in the flames of the Fire; it is also said: in the scorching wind of the Fire; and it is also said that this means: in the ice-biting wind of the Fire (and scalding water) and boiling water.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { فِي سَمُومٍ وَحَمِيمٍ وَظِلٍّ مِّن يَحْمُومٍ } فاليَحمومُ الدّخانُ

translations.translation: And His saying - {in a smoke and a heat and a dark cloud from which is} - the fire.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
المنهمكين في اللذات والشهوات البهيمية الموهمة الموقعة لأنواع الفتن والطغيان { وَحَمِيمٍ } [الواقعة: 42] أي: ماء متناهٍ في الحرارة بحيث يقطع أمعاءهم
 لو شربوا منه شربة بدل ما تلذذوا في النشأة الأولى بمقتضيات الأماني النفسانية والآمال الهيولانية الحاصلة من الجهل المفرط بسرائر التوحيد واليقين في النشأة الأولى

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ وحميم } وماء حارّ
 تناهي في الحرارة
